name: find-files_advanced_find_files
description: An advanced tool to search for files on the user's computer with enhanced filtering options including wildcard patterns, content search, and file type filtering.

directories.description: The directory paths to start the search from. Multiple directories can be specified.

filename.description: The name or wildcard pattern of the file to search for (e.g., *.txt, file*, *test*).

extension.description: The file extension to search for (e.g., pdf, txt, jpg).

createdAfter.description: Search for files created after this date (YYYY-MM-DD format).

createdBefore.description: Search for files created before this date (YYYY-MM-DD format).

modifiedAfter.description: Search for files modified after this date (YYYY-MM-DD format).

modifiedBefore.description: Search for files modified before this date (YYYY-MM-DD format).

caseSensitive.description: Whether filename matching should be case-sensitive.

contentSearch.description: Search for this text within file contents (text files only).

fileType.description: Filter by file type (e.g., text, image, audio).

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return.

timeoutMs.description: Maximum search time in milliseconds before timeout.
